Package gg.xp.xivsupport.autoexit

Class AutoExit

java.lang.Object
gg.xp.xivsupport.autoexit.AutoExit
public class AutoExit extends Object
Plugin to let triggevent automatically exit when ffxiv, ACT, or any other arbitrary process exits
